step_feedback.feedback: For step 1, try to keep your elbows straighter when reaching overhead. Focus on opening your fingers wide.
In step 2, aim for straighter arms when pushing down. Squeeze your shoulder blades together more firmly.
For step 3, ensure your arms are fully extended overhead when exhaling. Relax your shoulders as you stretch.
In step 4, focus on a smooth transition back overhead. Keep your arms extended and shoulders relaxed.
For step 5, try to keep your elbows and wrists straighter as you return to the starting position. Focus on controlled movement.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms straighter when reaching overhead and pushing down. Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together and relaxing as you exhale.
